_header: Mans soul is subtle and quaint
Title(s): ‘Man know þy self and lerne to dye’
_description: ‘Man know þy self and lerne to dye’ — fifteen 8-line stanzas

BodDig102.First Lines:
MAnnys soule is sotyl & queyntShal neuere ende þouȝ
                    he dede gynne…
BodDig102.Last Lines:
…While þy dede is in þy powerebe þyn awen frend
                    er þou dyȝe
BodDig102.Attributed Title: Man knew þy self and lerne to dye (f. 104v)
BodDig102.Editions:
Kail,  J.,
                        ed.  
             Twenty-Six Political and Other Poems…from Bodleian MSS Digby 102
                and Douce 322.
EETS
         o.s. 124 (1904; repr. 1973): 27-31.
